Wisdom: اجْعَلْ جِدَّكَ لِإِعْدَادِ الْجَوَابِ لِيَوْمِ الْمَسْأَلَةِ وَالْحِسَابِ
enWisdom: Work hard in preparing the answers for the Day of Questioning and Reckoning

Wisdom: احْذَرْ قِلَّةَ الزَّادِ وَأَكْثِرْ مِنَ الِاسْتِعْدَادِ لِرِحْلَتِكَ [تَسْعَدْ بِرِحْلَتِكَ‏]
enWisdom: Beware of insufficient provisions and increase your preparations for your departure

Wisdom: أَلَا مُسْتَعِدٌّ لِلِقَاءِ رَبِّهِ قَبْلَ زُهُوقِ نَفْسِهِ
enWisdom: Is there nobody who is ready to meet his Lord before his soul leaves [his body]?

Wisdom: إِنَّمَا أَنْتُمْ كَرَكْبٍ وُقُوفٍ لَا يَدْرُونَ مَتَى بِاْلَمسِيرِ [بِالسَّيْرِ] يُؤْمَرُونَ
enWisdom: You are only like the standing [and ready] riders who do not know when they will be ordered to march

Wisdom: سَوْفَ يَأْتِيكَ أَجَلُكَ فَأَجْمِلْ فِي الطَّلَبِ
enWisdom: Your death will [soon] come to you, so be moderate in what you seek

Wisdom: عَلَيْكَ بِحُسْنِ التَّأَهُّبِ وَالِاسْتِعْدَادِ وَالِاسْتِكْثَارِ مِنَ الزَّادِ
enWisdom: You must be well prepared and ready, and increase in your provision [for the Hereafter]

Wisdom: عَجِبْتُ لِغَفْلَةِ ذَوِي الْأَلْبَابِ عَنْ حُسْنِ الِارْتِيَادِ وَالِاسْتِعْدَادِ لِلْمَعَادِ
enWisdom: I am surprised by the negligence of the intelligent ones with regards to seeking provisions and preparing for the Hereafter

Wisdom: مَنْ تَذَكَّرَ بُعْدَ السَّفَرِ اسْتَعَدَّ
enWisdom: One who recalls the distance of his journey, prepares [for it]

Wisdom: مَنْ عَقَلَ تَيَقَّظَ مِنْ غَفْلَتِهِ وَتَأَهَّبَ لِرِحْلَتِهِ وَعَمَرَ دَارَ إِقَامَتِهِ
enWisdom: One who has intelligence awakens from his negligence, prepares for his journey and maintains [and develops] his abode of [permanent] residence

Wisdom: مَنْ عَرَفَ الْأَيَّامَ لَمْ يَغْفُلْ عَنِ الِاسْتِعْدَادِ
enWisdom: One who understands the times [in which he lives] does not neglect to prepare [for what is to come]

Wisdom: مَنِ اشْتَاقَ أَدْلَجَ
enWisdom: One who longs [for Allah] sets out [towards him] at nightfall

Wisdom: مَنِ اسْتَعَدَّ لِسَفَرِهِ قَرَّ عَيْناً بِحَضَرِهِ
enWisdom: One who has prepared for his journey is delighted upon his arrival

Wisdom: مِنَ الْحَزْمِ التَّأَهُّبُ وَالِاسْتِعْدَادُ
enWisdom: From judiciousness comes preparedness and readiness

Wisdom: مِنْ كَمَالِ الْحَزْمِ الِاسْتِعْدَادُ لِلنُّقْلَةِ وَالتَّأَهُّبُ لِلرِّحْلَةِ
enWisdom: From the excellence of judiciousness is being prepared to move and being ready to travel [from this world to the next]

Wisdom: مَا قَدَّمْتَ الْيَوْمَ تَقْدَمُ عَلَيْهِ غَداً فَامْهَدْ لِقَدَمِكَ وَقَدِّمْ لِيَوْمِكَ
enWisdom: That which you send forth today is what you shall come upon tomorrow, so make arrangements for your arrival and send forth [provisions] for your day

Wisdom: يَنْبَغِي لِمَنْ عَرَفَ سُرْعَةَ رِحْلَتِهِ أَنْ يُحْسِنَ التَّأَهُّبَ لِنُقْلَتِهِ
enWisdom: It behoves the one who knows about the quickness of his departure to be well prepared for the move

Wisdom: بَادِرُوا الْمَوْتَ وَغَمَرَاتِهِ وَمَهِّدُوا لَهُ قَبْلَ حُلُولِهِ وَأَعِدُّوا لَهُ قَبْلَ نُزُولِهِ
enWisdom: Anticipate death and its throes, prepare for it before its arrival and get ready for it before it descends

Wisdom: إِنَّ الْغَايَةَ أَمَامَكُمْ وَإِنَّ السَّاعَةَ وَرَاءَكُمْ تَحْدُوكُمْ
enWisdom: Lighten your burden, for indeed the goal is in front of you and time is behind you, driving you forward

Wisdom: مَنْ خَافَ الْوَعِيدَ قَرَّبَ عَلَى نَفْسِهِ الْبَعِيدَ
enWisdom: One who fears the threat of Allah [to the evildoers] brings close to himself that which is far

Wisdom: شَوِّقُوا أَنْفُسَكُمْ إِلَى نَعِيمِ الْجَنَّةِ تُحِبُّوا الْمَوْتَ وَتَمْقُتُوا الْحَيَاةَ
enWisdom: Fill yourselves with desire for the bounties of Paradise, [and] you will love death and loathe [this worldly] life

Wisdom: الرَّحِيلُ وَشِيكٌ
enWisdom: Departure [from this world] is imminent
